result.title: C â€” Problem with %lld
result.content: Hi! I've seen that this is a very common issue, but i can't solve it anyway. There are some problems in which I need to print a very large int, so I use %lld (%ld is not enough in some cases). How can I avoid it? I've read many answers to similar questions, but all of them are based on C++ (use cout or cin), and the problem is that this kind of functions doesn't exist in C. What can I do? Thanks!
